data.text: @flyguy84 Hello there, great to hear you are looking to join our Flying Club! Sorry you are having technical issues. So we can look into this for you please contact us. You can find the best way to get in touch, including by Live Chat online here: https://t.co/ixq0EYUNgN .^Georgina

data.text: @CoughOx3 I hope you had a good flight with us! I am sorry for any confusion but our policy is If you're travelling with other people, you can't combine your luggage allowance, so you'll need separate cases for each person that fit within the allowance. https://t.co/1ice65ZqB5
